text: Delivering Trusted Control Solutions for over 25 years 19770 Bahama St. Northridge, CA 91324 V: 818.898.3380 F: 818.898.3360 sales@dnfcontrols.com www.dnfcontrols.com SNMP TRAPS- Add Physical Alarm Outputs Everything s Under Control  Physical Alarm Outputs absent on new devices Using SNMP Traps instead to generate alarms  Receive SNMP Trap & Generate Physical Output Receive TRAPs from up to 8 Devices  Monitor specific TRAP Alarms Monitor any Object Name & Object Value Match Full or Partial Object Name (OID) Match Full or Partial Object Value (OID Value)  Generate 4, 8, or 16 physical outputs Latching or Momentary  Upon Receipt of TRAP:  Turn a GPO ON / OFF  Transmit Serial or IP Alert Message  Trigger a Sequence of Alert Actions  Web-browser based Configuration Tool:  Easy to Enter Monitored OID and OID Value  Assign Single or Multiple Alert Actions  No Scripting Required EG-4
